about-us-des-darna: Since 1990, we have been dedicated to providing our clients with the             highest quality of architectural designs, finishing materials,             construction, and maintenance services. We pride ourselves on our             long history, and our even longer portfolio of residential buildings             and, more recently, commercial and medical buildings too,Our clients             know how devoted we are to always providing them with the best in             whatever we do and for that, they trust us with their investments.

footer.description: At Darna, we believe real estate development is not just about building structures — it's about building trust and long-lasting relationships with our clients.

hero.find-your-dream: Your journey starts with a place made just for you.
hero.main-title: Long Island Matrouh  A Coastal Retreat Like No Other
hero.title: Located on Rommel Island in Marsa Matrouh, Long Island by Darna offers sea-view chalets overlooking the Mediterranean and Rommel Bay. Enjoy privacy, greenery, and full services including a resort, kids’ area, and year-round security. Book now and start your summer in the heart of beauty.

projects.duplex-title: In a prime location on Al Sadat Road, Terrace Mall offers ready-to-move commercial, administrative, and medical units. With smart design and complete services like banks, restaurants, a hypermarket, and multi-level parking, it’s your opportunity for secure and growing investment

testimonials.name: Anjilina Jolli
testimonials.review: Darna delivered exactly what they promised on time and with exceptional quality. Their dedication and responsiveness made our experience smooth from start to finish

testimonials.name: Evana Yas
testimonials.review: We partnered with Darna for a commercial project, and they exceeded our expectations. Their handling of construction, finishing, and after-sales support was truly professional

testimonials.name: Cristina Frank
testimonials.review: From the first meeting to handover, Darna's team impressed us with their transparency and attention to each detail. The final result truly felt like home.
